ModMetadata.Name: No Offline Metabolism Difficulties
ModMetadata.Author: G'lek Tarssza
ModMetadata.Description:
Title says it all.
Adds a new difficulty setting which is equivalent to the existing difficulties but with offline metabolism disabled.
Designed to facilitate LAN- or Steam-based multiplayer games.
Please submit issues either through the Steam Workshop discussions tab or on GitHub: https://github.com/glek/stationeers-mods/issues
